name: InatelVania
description:
InatelVania is a MetroidVania being developed for the Fetin, an exposure by the students from Inatel, a college in Santa Rita do Sapucaí, MG. It's was first developed by four students, just two keep up with the project:

Tales Machado Prudente - Director/ Game Designer/ Programmer

Arthur de Paula Assis - Artist/ Animations

The story consistis at a nameless Student, who has to give his final paper at college. In the middle of the way, he is intercepted by the Student's Four Horsemen of Apocalypse: Laziness, Procrastination, Disorganization and Anxiety. And they try to stop the student's journey. At this Fetin Edition, only Laziness is in the game.
